description: UPDATE: Share your ranking by email, messaging or with the official facebook app.                                                           Just Pong from MetaViewSoft is a clone of the well-known pong game. Your goal of the game is to prevent the ball from 	leaving the playfield on the right side. Use your paddle to catch the ball and move it back to the left 	side of the screen. The side which is 5 balls advanced first will win the game. How to play? Tilt the device up or down to steer your paddle. The zero point is set when you tap the screen to start the game. Tilt more to move the paddle faster. How to score? The points you earn or lose depends on the amount of side changes the ball did have before it left the playfield. If the computer missed the ball you earn more points as more balls you are in advance. If you missed the ball your points just decrease. An online highscore list is available. Use the application menu to access it and compare your score with players world wide. To share your score enable this feature in the preferences and enter your nickname.
